/>
XI.ii.3.B.3.d
.
Rights Not Afforded to the Substitute Claimant
Rights that may have applied to the claimant prior to death but which cannot practically apply to a substitute are not available to the substitute.
Example
:  Medical examinations.
Reference
:  For more information on the rights not afforded to the substitute claimant, see
38 CFR 3.1010(f)(3)
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B  - Substitution in Case of Death of Claimant
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
